comment._content: Per the telephone directory, Mr. Ligh's apartment was at 2806 West Cary. "The Westhampton" Apartments on the north side of Cary between Boulevard and Colonial.

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: William Ligh was listed in the City Directory of 1963 as "Reverend William Ligh". He was director of the Chinese program for the Richmond Baptist Association that was housed at Grove Avenue Baptist Church and remained the director of the program until his death in 1977. He was also a newpaper columnist and a 1953 graduate of the University of Richmond.
